channel.title: What the heck?
channel.description: I finally figured out a little issue with my dialogue system where it would jump to the last bloody dialogue in the NPC's given dialogues. However I'm not sure how to fix it. THIS IS THE ISSUE: I have the sendNextDialogue method call the other method called "sendDialogue(player, getChatId() + 1, getTalkingTo());" The reason why I highlighted that method and the +1 is because when I did System.out.println to print the ID of the next chat, it said 31 when it's supposed to be 3… How do I make it so that it makes it 4 not 31.

item.title: What the heck?
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

If you could simply help me get a 194 client up and running… I don’t even care if it’s a look-a-like at this point… I’ll be able to make some serious progress…

Read full topic

item.title: What the heck?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Revamp dis Shit, post:5, topic:536304”][quote author=Docent link=topic=655113.msg4386832#msg4386832 date=1385914164]

Tbh that makes no sense to me and has got to be the weirdest issue i’ve ever heard of…

Apparently you’re saying if the value for “getChatId()” is 3 and you add a “+ 1” to the statement your command prompt will display 31? WTF…
…and if you ever need another dev for the 194 or feel like giving me my own 194 source + client to start my RS remake that’d be much appreciated

As I Roll Deep, It is his turn to work on the source. If you want a somewhat empty one look up “RS2-Beta Packaged 194” on google.
[/quote]
After hours on end of searching for a real 194 server + client have proved futile…
Now i’m left with a 194 look-a-like client and a 317 server…worst part is, I can’t get the client to start up[/quote]

Dude I have the real 194 server and client, I just don’t know how to load maps to the client…

Read full topic

item.title: What the heck?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

I finally figured out a little issue with my dialogue system where it would jump to the last bloody dialogue in the NPC’s given dialogues. However I’m not sure how to fix it. THIS IS THE ISSUE: I have the sendNextDialogue method call the other method called “sendDialogue(player, getChatId() + 1, getTalkingTo());” The reason why I highlighted that method and the +1 is because when I did System.out.println to print the ID of the next chat, it said 31 when it’s supposed to be 3… How do I make it so that it makes it 4 not 31.
